title: `tensorflow.examples.tutorials.mnist` not currently downloadable
body_html:
If possible, provide a minimal reproducible example (We usually don't have time to read hundreds of lines of your code)

from tensorflow.examples.tutorials.mnist import input_data
mnist = input_data.read_data_sets("/tmp/data/", one_hot=True)

raises http.client.RemoteDisconnected: Remote end closed connection without response, if you don't already have the data cached. I believe this is because the underlying data SOURCE_URL is currently down.
body_text:
If possible, provide a minimal reproducible example (We usually don't have time to read hundreds of lines of your code)
from tensorflow.examples.tutorials.mnist import input_data
mnist = input_data.read_data_sets("/tmp/data/", one_hot=True)
raises http.client.RemoteDisconnected: Remote end closed connection without response, if you don't already have the data cached. I believe this is because the underlying data SOURCE_URL is currently down.
body:
### If possible, provide a minimal reproducible example (We usually don't have time to read hundreds of lines of your code)

```python
from tensorflow.examples.tutorials.mnist import input_data
mnist = input_data.read_data_sets("/tmp/data/", one_hot=True)
```

raises `http.client.RemoteDisconnected: Remote end closed connection without response`, if you don't already have the data cached. I believe this is because the underlying data [SOURCE_URL](http://yann.lecun.com/exdb/mnist/) is currently [down](http://downforeveryoneorjustme.com/http://yann.lecun.com/exdb/mnist/).
